plentry.pd:
Sets whether to publish video captured by the camera.
: Publish video captured by the camera.
: (Default) Do not publish video captured by the camera.

Sets whether to publish audio captured by the microphone.
: Publish audio captured by the microphone.
: (Default) Do not publish audio captured by the microphone.

Sets whether to publish custom captured audio.
: Publish custom captured audio.
: (Default) Do not publish custom captured audio.

Sets whether to publish custom captured video.
: Publish custom captured video.
: (Default) Do not publish custom captured video.
The video track ID returned by the method. Default is 0.

Whether to publish video captured by the camera.
: Publish camera video.
: (Default) Do not publish camera video.

Whether to publish audio captured by the microphone.
: Publish microphone audio.
: (Default) Do not publish microphone audio.

Whether to publish custom captured audio.
: Publish custom audio.
: (Default) Do not publish custom audio.

Whether to publish custom captured video.
: Publish custom video.
: (Default) Do not publish custom video.
The video track ID returned by the method. Default is 0.

Sets whether to publish video captured by the camera.
: Publish video captured by the camera.
: (Default) Do not publish video captured by the camera.

Sets whether to publish audio captured by the microphone.
: Publish audio captured by the microphone.
: (Default) Do not publish audio captured by the microphone.

Sets whether to publish custom captured audio.
: Publish custom captured audio.
: (Default) Do not publish custom captured audio.

Sets whether to publish custom captured video.
: Publish custom captured video.
: (Default) Do not publish custom captured video.
The video track ID returned by the method. Default value is 0.

Sets whether to publish the video captured by the camera.
: Publish camera-captured video.
: (Default) Do not publish camera-captured video.

Sets whether to publish the audio captured by the microphone.
: Publish microphone-captured audio.
: (Default) Do not publish microphone-captured audio.

Sets whether to publish custom-captured audio.
: Publish custom-captured audio.
: (Default) Do not publish custom-captured audio.

Sets whether to publish custom-captured video.
: Publish custom-captured video.
: (Default) Do not publish custom-captured video.
The video track ID returned by the method. Default is 0.
